Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation:
&html< Win! > s rtoken = $Get(%request.Data("refresh_token",1)) s atoken = $Get(%request.Data("access_token",1)) s ^Settings("Google", "RefreshToken") = rtoken w "Refresh token is """_rtoken_"""",! w "
" w "Access token is """_atoken_"""",! w "

" d ##class(Stc.Google.Authorize).ExchangeToken(rtoken, .status, .atoken) w "Status is """_status_"""",! w "
" w "Another access token is """_atoken_"""",! &html< > Quit $$$OK
